title: Who wore it best? Strictly Come Dancing week four: the costumier’s verdict
text:
Scottish Ballet’s senior wardrobe technician Ciara Nolan gives her verdict on the fourth week’s costumes

With last week's departure of 1980s icon Anneka Rice, we could be forgiven for thinking we'd seen the last of the retro jumpsuit. Then along came Karren and Chris in week four, jiving to Saturday Night’s Alright. Everything about these metallic liquid foil fabrics was wrong, but to this life-long Elton John fan it felt so right.

Michelle’s dress was another eyesore but, somehow, she made it work. Salsa costumes don’t need to hold back in colour and flamboyance (or frills, apparently) and this week the costume department definitely didn’t. We saw Dev and Dianne in matching fiery red, and...
description: Scottish Ballet’s senior wardrobe technician Ciara Nolan gives her verdict on the fourth week’s costumes
